AT.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
AT.description: Die neuesten Fortsetzung der "Samurai Warriors Chronicles" ist nun auf dem Nintendo 3DS™! Wechsle in Echtzeit zwischen bis zu vier spielbaren Charakteren und benutze die in "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4" eingeführten "Hyper Attacks", die diesen Titel zum Strategiezentrum dieser Serie machen. Im neuen "Challenge Mode" stellst du dich einer Reihe von Aufgaben, die du nacheinander innerhalb eines Zeitlimits lösen musst, um dein endgültiges Ziel zu erreichen. Du kannst sogar nachsehen, welchen Rang du unter den vielen Kriegern einnimmst. Waffen-Upgrades, angepasste Teile und anderes mehr machen aus diesem Titel ein überaus packendes Spiel, das dich nicht mehr loslassen wird.

AU.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
AU.description: The Latest sequel of "SAMURAI WARRIORS Chronicles" is now on the Nintendo 3DS™! Switch between up to four playable characters in real time, and use the "Hyper Attacks" to make this the most strategically rich title in the series to date! The new "Challenge Mode" allows you to tackle a series of objectives, one after the other, with a time limit, and reach your final goal! You can even check your rankings against other warriors online! Weapon upgrades, custom parts and more make this a truly immersive title.

BG.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
BG.description: The Latest sequel of "SAMURAI WARRIORS Chronicles" is now on the Nintendo 3DS™! Switch between up to four playable characters in real time, and use the "Hyper Attacks" to make this the most strategically rich title in the series to date! The new "Challenge Mode" allows you to tackle a series of objectives, one after the other, with a time limit, and reach your final goal! You can even check your rankings against other warriors online! Weapon upgrades, custom parts and more make this a truly immersive title.

BE.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
BE.description: La dernière suite de "Samurai Warriors Chronicles" est maintenant sur la Nintendo 3DS™! Permettant d'alterner en temps réel entre un maximum de quatre personnages jouables et bénéficiant du système des "Hyper Attacks" introduit dans "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4", ce jeu est le plus stratégique de la série à ce jour ! Le nouveau "Challenge Mode" vous propose d'accomplir une série d'objectifs en temps limité jusqu'à atteindre votre but final ! Vous pouvez même comparer vos résultats avec ceux d'autres guerriers grâce aux classements en ligne ! Des améliorations d'arme, des éléments de personnalisation et bien d'autres choses finissent de faire de ce jeu une expérience véritablement immersive.

ES.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
ES.description: La última secuela de "Samurai Warriors Chronicles" ahora está en la Nintendo 3DS™! ¡Cambia entre un máximo de cuatro personajes jugables en tiempo real y usa los "Hyper Attacks" introducidos en "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4" para convertir a este en el título más estratégico de la serie hasta el momento! ¡El nuevo "Challenge Mode" te permite enfrentarte a una serie de objetivos, uno detrás de otro, en un tiempo limitado y alcanzar tu meta! ¡Hasta puedes comparar tus puntuaciones con las de otros guerreros en línea! Las mejoras de armas, partes personalizadas y más hacen de este un juego muy inmersivo.

IT.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
IT.description: L'ultimo sequel di "Samurai Warriors Chronicles" è ora su Nintendo 3DS™! Alterna in tempo reale fino a quattro personaggi giocabili e usa gli "Hyper Attack" introdotti in "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4" per rendere questo episodio della serie il più ricco dal punto di vista strategico! Il nuovo "Challenge Mode" ti permette di affrontare una serie di obiettivi, uno dopo l'altro, con un limite di tempo, per raggiungere il traguardo finale! Puoi anche controllare la tua classificazione rispetto ad altri guerrieri online! Miglioramenti delle armi, parti personalizzate e altro rendono questo titolo estremamente coinvolgente.

NL.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
NL.description: De nieuwste vervolg van "Samurai Warriors Chronicles is nu op de Nintendo 3DS™! Schakel live tussen maximaal vier speelbare personages en zet de Hyper Attacks uit SAMURAI WARRIORS 4 strategisch in! In de nieuwe Challenge Mode krijg je te maken met een reeks doelen die je in een bepaalde volgorde en binnen de tijdlimiet moet volbrengen. Vervolgens kun je online jouw score met die van andere krijgers vergelijken! Dankzij de wapenupgrades, aanpasonderdelen en nog veel meer ga je helemaal op in deze game.

NZ.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
NZ.description: The Latest sequel of "SAMURAI WARRIORS Chronicles" is now on the Nintendo 3DS™! Switch between up to four playable characters in real time, and use the "Hyper Attacks" to make this the most strategically rich title in the series to date! PL.description: The Latest sequel of "SAMURAI WARRIORS Chronicles" is now on the Nintendo 3DS™! The new "Challenge Mode" allows you to tackle a series of objectives, one after the other, with a time limit, and reach your final goal! PT.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
PT.description: O mais recente sequela de "Samurai Warriors Chronicles" está agora na Nintendo 3DS™! Alterna entre quatro personagens jogáveis em tempo real e usa os "Hyper Attacks" introduzidos em "SAMURAI WARRIORS 4" para fazer deste título o mais rico a nível estratégico da série até à data! O novo "Challenge Mode" permite-te jogar uma série de objetivos, um após o outro, com um tempo limite, e alcançares a tua meta final! Podes até verificar as tuas classificações em relação a outros guerreiros online! Atualizações de armas, peças personalizadas e mais tornam este título uma experiência verdadeiramente envolvente.

RU.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
RU.description: Последние продолжение "Samurai Warriors" Хроники сейчас на Nintendo 3DS™! Переключение между 4 персонажами и Hyper Attacks, впервые появившиеся в SAMURAI WARRIORS 4, делают стратегию игры самой насыщенной в серии. Новый режим Challenge Mode позволит выполнить серию заданий за ограниченное время, достичь конечной цели и оценить свой рейтинг в сети. Улучшения оружия, элементы редактора и другие полезные детали обеспечивают полное погружение в игру.

SE.name: SAMURAI WARRIORS: Chronicles 3
SE.description: The Latest sequel of "SAMURAI WARRIORS Chronicles" is now on the Nintendo 3DS™! Switch between up to four playable characters in real time, and use the "Hyper Attacks" to make this the most strategically rich title in the series to date! The new "Challenge Mode" allows you to tackle a series of objectives, one after the other, with a time limit, and reach your final goal!
